types:type.name: productsjson
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type productsjson = Array<{| productId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, description: String, originalPrice: Number {"typeId": "int"}, offer: {| offerPrice: Number {"typeId": "int"}, offerValidUntil: Number {"typeId": "double"} |}, brandName: String, images: Array<String> |}> {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "[{\"productId\":1,\"name\":\"Hp Pavilion laptop\",\"description\":\"Hp Laptop \",\"originalPrice\":1000,\"offer\":{\"offerPrice\":1000,\"offerValidUntil\":1467105373745},\"brandName\":\"HP\",\"images\":[\"image1.jpeg\",\"image2.jpeg\",\"image3.jpeg\"]},{\"productId\":2,\"name\":\"Macbook Pro laptop\",\"description\":\"Apple Laptop \",\"originalPrice\":3000,\"offer\":{\"offerPrice\":3000,\"offerValidUntil\":1467105374471},\"brandName\":\"Apple\",\"images\":[\"image3.jpeg\",\"image4.jpeg\",\"image5.jpeg\"]},{\"productId\":3,\"name\":\"Mac Book laptop\",\"description\":\"Apple Laptop \",\"originalPrice\":2000,\"offer\":{\"offerPrice\":2000,\"offerValidUntil\":1467105374474},\"brandName\":\"Apple\",\"images\":[\"image6.jpeg\",\"image7.jpeg\",\"image8.jpeg\"]},{\"productId\":4,\"name\":\"IBM laptop\",\"description\":\"IBM Laptop \",\"originalPrice\":4000,\"offer\":{\"offerPrice\":4000,\"offerValidUntil\":1467105374477},\"brandName\":\"IBM\",\"images\":[\"image9.jpeg\",\"image10.jpeg\",\"image11.jpeg\"]},{\"productId\":5,\"name\":\"MotoX Mobile\",\"description\":\"Motorola Mobile \",\"originalPrice\":1000,\"offer\":{\"offerPrice\":1000,\"offerValidUntil\":1467105374480},\"brandName\":\"Motorola\",\"images\":[\"image12.jpeg\",\"image13.jpeg\",\"image14.jpeg\"]},{\"productId\":6,\"name\":\"Samsung Note 5\",\"description\":\"Samsung Mobile \",\"originalPrice\":5000,\"offer\":{\"offerPrice\":5000,\"offerValidUntil\":1467105374482},\"brandName\":\"Samsung\",\"images\":[\"image15.jpeg\",\"image16.jpeg\",\"image17.jpeg\"]}]"}
